mapper.delete: delete from TA_OFFICE_ARCHHANDLE where 1=1 and oid = #{oid}
mapper.insert:
insert into TA_OFFICE_ARCHHANDLE (oid,cc_form_instanceid,audit_time,opinion_content,logical_delete,activity_name,proc_ins_id,activity_id,business_key,audit_state,auditer_id,audit_org_id)
select #{entity.oid,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.ccFormInstanceid,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.auditTime,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP}, #{entity.opinionContent,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.logicalDelete,jdbcType = NUMERIC}, #{entity.activityName,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.procInsId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.activityId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.businessKey,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.auditState,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.auditerId.userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.auditOrgId.orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} from dual
mapper.delete:
delete from TA_OFFICE_ARCHHANDLE where oid in
#{entity.oid}
